trans-unit.source: Represents an attribute that is applied to the class definition to identify the types of the named parts that are used for templating.
trans-unit.target: 表示屬性，這個屬性會套用至類別定義，以識別用做為範本之具名部分的型別。

trans-unit.source: Control authors apply this attribute to the class definition to inform template authors the types of the parts to use for styling the class.
trans-unit.target: 控制項作者將這個屬性套用至類別定義，以通知範本作者類型的組件的樣式類別使用。

trans-unit.source: These parts are usually required in the template and have a specific predefined name.
trans-unit.target: 這些組件通常會要求在範本中，而且具有特定預先定義的名稱。

trans-unit.source: There can only be one element with a given name in any template.
trans-unit.target: 在任一範本中，只能有一個元素具有指定的名稱。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you look at the class declaration of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> class, you can see that the parts `PART_EditableTextBox` and `PART_Popup` are of types <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> respectively.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您在類別宣告看起來<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>類別，您所見，部分`PART_EditableTextBox`和`PART_Popup`型別的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>分別。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Guidelines for Designing Stylable Controls](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/guidelines-for-designing-stylable-controls.md)
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[設計可設定樣式的控制項的指導方針](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/guidelines-for-designing-stylable-controls.md)

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this class or its properties in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用這個類別或其屬性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.TemplatePartAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.TemplatePartAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the pre-defined name of the part.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定該部分的預先定義名稱。

trans-unit.source: The pre-defined name of the part.
trans-unit.target: 該部分的預先定義名稱。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
Gets or sets the type of the named part this attribute is identifying.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此屬性所識別之具名部分的型別。

trans-unit.source: The type of the named part this attribute is identifying.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性所識別之具名部分的型別。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
